title: Cyber attack frequency
description: Create a bar chart to display the frequency of different types of cyber attacks on a network, using 'black' for phishing, 'red' for malware, and 'purple' for ransomware.
solution:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

colors = {'Phishing': "black", "Malware": 'red', 'Ransomware': 'purple'}

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.bar(df['attack_type'], df['frequency'] , color=[colors[attack_type] for attack_type in df['attack_type']])
plt.title("Frequency of Different Types of Cyber Attack on a Network")
plt.xlabel("Attack Type")
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.grid(axis="y")
plt.show()
